覺.definition: to feel; to find that; thinking; awake; aware

覺察.definition: to sense; to perceive; to come to realize; to be aware

覺得.definition: to think that ...; to feel that ...; to feel (uncomfortable etc)

覺悟.definition: to come to understand; to realize; consciousness; awareness; Buddhist enlightenment (Sanskrit: cittotpāda)

覺醒.definition: to awaken; to come to realize; awakened to the truth; the truth dawns upon one; scales fall from the eyes; to become aware
